public class ClassConverter extends BaseStringConverter<Class>
Converts between Class objects and fully-qualified class names.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • onToValue

      protected Class<?> onToValue(String value)
      Implemented by subclass to convert the given string to a value. The subclass implementation will never be called in cases where value is null or empty, so it need not check for either case.
      Overrides:
      onToValue in class BaseStringConverter<Class>
      Parameters:
      value - The (guaranteed non-null, non-empty) value to convert
      Returns:
      The converted object
